newsitem.title: USA: AFTER THE BELL - Adobe Systems shrs rise.
newsitem.headline: AFTER THE BELL - Adobe Systems shrs rise.

text.p: Shares of Adobe Systems Inc rose 2-1/2 to 37-1/2 on Wednesday, traders said.

After the market closed, Adobe announced earnings for the third quarter ended August 30 of $0.40 a share on revenues of $180.9 million, compared with $0.44 a share on revenues of $183.1 million the previous third quarter.
The 1996 third quarter results include investment gains of $0.05 a share.
According to First Call, the consensus analyst estimate for the quarter was $0.35 a share.
The New York Stock Exchange said EG&G Inc, Three-Five Systems Inc, Terex Corp, Starter Corp and Wells Fargo & Co preferred F were unavailable for news after hours.

The NYSE said session one volume was 17,600 shares, compared with 3,000 shares Tueseday. Session two volume was 25,186,356 versus 2,263,100. The American Stock Exchange said there was no after-hours activity.
